title: Belarusian journalist Roman Protasevich appears on state TV as critics decry his detention as a 'hostage'-taking
content:
1. Belarusian journalist Roman Protasevich appears on state TV as critics decry his detention as a 'hostage'-taking  CNN
  2. Video: Roman Protasevich praises Belarusian leader on state TV  Business Insider
  3. Belarusians in Kyiv rally in support of activists  AP Archive
  4. Belarus: more than a moral dilemma  Financial Times
  5. She Speaks: Why have we allowed power to become so desirable that people will do anything to maintain it? | Commentary  Huntsville Doppler

localize.title: ベラルーシのジャーナリスト、ロマン・プロタセビッチ氏が国営テレビに出演。
白俄罗斯记者罗曼-普罗塔塞维奇出现在国家电视台，批评者谴责将其拘留为 "劫持人质"。
白俄羅斯記者羅曼-普羅塔塞維奇出現在國家電視臺，批評者譴責將其拘留爲 "劫持人質"。
